qas.question: Where do most Cypriots receiver higher education?

answers.text: Greek, British, Turkish, other European and North American universities

qas.question: What nation has the highest level percentage of working citizens with higher-level education?
What percentage of the 25-34 Cyprus population has tertiary education?
How many Cypriots students attend school outside of the country

context: The majority of Cypriots receive their higher education at <a0_0>Greek, British, Turkish, other European and North American universities<a0_0/>. It is noteworthy that <a1_0>Cyprus<a1_0/> currently has the highest percentage of citizens of working age who have higher-level education in the EU at 30% which is ahead of Finland's 29.5%. In addition, <a2_0>47%<a2_0/> of its population aged 25–34 have tertiary education, which is the highest in the EU. The body of Cypriot students is highly mobile, with <a3_0>78.7%<a3_0/> studying in a university outside Cyprus.
